quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Life is what happens while you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.text: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.text: It is never too late to give up our prejudices.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
quotes.author: Dan Reeves

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: What we think, we become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quotes.text: Little things make big days.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Progress, not perfection.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Your only limit is your mind.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: If you're not willing to learn, no one can help you. If you're determined to learn, no one can stop you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to get started, but you have to get started to be great.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: A goal is not always meant to be reached, it often serves simply as something to aim at.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.text: Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.text: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: You can't go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass... it's about learning to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Vivian Greene

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.text: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.text: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.text: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.text: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.text: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.text: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: What matters most is how well you walk through the fire.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.text: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: We cannot direct the wind, but we can adjust our sails.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton
